alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lincoln County; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 28 at 6:47PM MST until March 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Lincoln County and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lincoln County; Southwest Chaves County
